Taaskin

Taaskin is the emptyLink god of harvest. He is one of the most prayed to deities as he helps the vast agricultural population of Ensulasia. He is often portrayed as an elderly man with curled ram horns and a shepherds crook in hand. To earn favor with Taaskin many farmers hold regular ceremonies to him and will offer a portion of their yield as thanks, either through burning of crops, or animal sacrifices.
